title: Deaf Man Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: A man with a medium-dark skin tone, with his hand cupped to his ear and his thumb extended, indicating he is deaf or hard of hearing. This emoji signifies communication challenges or the deaf community.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the deaf man emoji, with a medium-dark skin tone, depicts a dignified individual using sign language to convey communication without sound. The design on Apple devices features clear, distinct hand shapes and a gentle, understanding facial expression, all rendered with Apple's characteristic soft lighting and smooth, rounded forms. This emoji serves as a vital symbol of inclusivity, awareness, and the beautiful diversity of communication methods.
